messages.title: Ruth Cadbury: well-respected, local - a strong voice for you.
messages.content: Labour Party members have chosen Ruth Cadbury to be Labour’s candidate for the General Election. Ruth has lived in Brentford for 30 years, and has a 20-year track record standing up for local people on the Council. Now Ruth’s asking for your support to help make this a Labour seat again.

Your vote really matters this May; in 2010 the Tories only narrowly won this seat, and their win here allowed them to govern. A vote for Ruth will elect a trusted campaigner to speak up for you, and will help deliver a new Labour government.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In 2010 the Tories only narrowly won this seat.

leaflet.personalStatement: Labour Party members have chosen Ruth Cadbury to be Labour’s candidate for the General Election. Ruth has lived in Brentford for 30 years, and has a 20-year track record standing up for local people on the Council.
